actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to limit extension of the injury test in countervailing duty cases.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to redefine "country under the Agreement" (dealing with countervailing duties) to mean a country that is a signatory to both the Agreement on Subsidies and Countervailing Measures and the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade or that has assumed similar obligations with the United States before March 18, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to limit extension of the injury test in countervailing duty cases.
